name: Stickman Catapult Shooting
description:
Resist incoming massive waves of various rivals and repel every attack! Protect your castle as a stickman warrior with Stickman Catapult Shooting!

Stop the invasion of Flying People and help small medieval stickman defend his stronghold from the siege weapons of the enemy!

Use all your skills to defeat everybody standing in your way! Tap on the screen and pull to charge the catapult, then release to launch the projectile into the enemy and enjoy your victory!

Fight against a massive wave of incoming enemies! Earn points for each successfully struck rival and unlock new powerful catapults and siege machines like trebuchet or cannon! Check different ammo for your catapult – bombs or fireballs (with greek fire)!

Stickman Catapult Shooting features:
Stickman siege weapon shooting simulator
Different kinds of shells and projectiles to variate the enemy's destruction
Various cannons and catapults
Very addictive gameplay
